meta.description: Tom and Jerry's farm crop planting problem

params.name: profit
params.description: Profit per acre for each crop

vars.name: x
vars.description: x[c] = acres of land used for crop c

objective.name: max_total_profit
objective.expr: sum(profit[c] * x[c] for c in CROPS)

constraints.name: total_area
constraints.description: Total area of the farm is 100 acres

constraints.name: corn_wheat_ratio
constraints.description: Area for corn should be at least twice the area for wheat

constraints.name: soybeans_sorghum_ratio
constraints.description: Area for soybeans should be at least half the area for sorghum

constraints.name: wheat_sorghum_ratio
constraints.description: Area for wheat must be three times the area for sorghum
